item.title: First (and only?) Blog Post!
item.description: Hello to whoever is grading this! Hi, Jacks here. This might not be as eloquent or as beautiful as one might like, but it'll get the job done. In this blog post, I'm going to go over a basic but powerful concept in Python we learned in class. I will also use reticulate to demonstrate how you can move around information from R to Python and vice versa, as per the rubric.
